alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 3:09PM CDT until March 23 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice and snow. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and Tuesday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
